defs: a variety in snakes.
a variety in mango trees.
= ಕೇರಳ.
a state in South West India, on the coast of Arabian sea.
(masc.) an inhabitant of that state.
the coconut palm.
a woman who is an inhabitant of Kēraḷa state, in South West India.
the act of blowing the chaff from grain by winnowing.
a narrow way between hedges, walls, buildings, etc.; narrow country road or city street; a lane.
a number of people or things arranged so as to form a line, esp. a straight line; a row.
any of the four coloured stripes on the chequered cloth used in the game of dice.
to take a street; to go along the way.
to separate chaff, unwanted lighter particles etc. from grain, by winnowing.
(fig.) to examine with care and separate deficiencies in a work.
ಕೇರು ಕಟ್ಟು kēru kaṭṭu to inflict pain; to cause damage, loss, difficulty, hindrance, etc.; ಕೇರು ಹಾಕು kēru hāku = ಕೇರು ಕಟ್ಟು.
an apparatus made of bamboo splits for winnowing grain; a winnow.
= ಕೇರಬೀಜ.
the non-poisonous snake Ptyas mucosus; rat-snake.
the marrow or fat of the rat-snake (Ptyas mucosus).

any of various orders of cartilaginous fishes that are usu. large and mostly marine, having a tough, spiny, usu. slate-grey skin, separate lateral gill openings, and a slender, rounded body with the mouth on the underside; a shark.
to construct a wall; to raise a structure as a wall.
a wall like structure (of bamboo, wood, etc.).
a framework consisting of two parallel bamboo sidepieces connected by a series of rungs or crosspieces on which a person steps in climbing up or down; a ladder.
a large earthen pot.
the evergreen tree Ficus tjakela of Moraceae family.
any activity or experience that gives enjoyment or recreation; a game; a sport.
a amorous sport or love-making activity.
a building for playing games; a sport-house.
a friend of the hero (in Samskřta dramas).
= ಕೇಲಿಕಾಗೃಹ.
= ಕೇಲಿಕಾಗೃಹ.
to amuse oneself, as by taking part in a game or sport; to engage in recreation; to play.
= ಕೇಲಿಕಾಗೃಹ.
a pleasure-grove or garden.
an intense and prolonged desire; yearning or appetite, as for affection, food, drug, art, etc.
the quality or condition of being safe and happy; freedom from danger, injury, sickness or damage; security; safety; welfare.
(dial.) the quality of being arrogant, overbearing; arrogance; pride.
the tree Pandanus fascicularis ( = P. odoratissimus, = P. tectorius) of Pandanaceae family; screw pine tree.
its flower.
the grass Cyperus rotundus ( = C. hexastachyus) of Cyperaceae family; sedge.
= ಕೇವಟಿ.
the act of inlaying (something into the surface of another).
the act pushing or throwing.
an ornament inlayed with a pearl, gem etc.
to insert or inlay (something) in to the surface of another (to enhance the beauty, value, etc.).
to smear or rub over with oil or ointment; to anoint.
to cause to put on (as a jacket).
to mix; to cause to mingle; to put together.
alone of its or their kind; by itself or by themselves; only.
alone in its or their superiority; best; finest.
perfect; complete; whole; absolute.
not mixed; pure.
not limited by a constitution, parliament, etc.; unrestricted.
of very ordinary class; of the masses; common.
nothing more or other than; mere; only (in limiting or restricting sense).
(phil.) ultimate reality regarded as uncaused, unmodified, unified and complete, timeless, etc.; the Absolute.
a man who has transcended the mundanity.
the state of being free from worldly attachment or from the cycle of births and deaths; Final Emancipation of the soul.
a yogic breathing exercise, in which air is breathed out completely, and not inhaled for some time.
(Jain.) the Absolute knowledge.
the plant Ixora nigricans of Rubiaceae family.
its flower.
the plant Ixora coccinea of Rubiaceae family.
(phil.) the Supreme Knowledge.
(Jain.) the effect or the power of a person's actions that affect the state of the Supreme Knowledge.
(phil.) a person who has gained the Supreme Knowledge.
the oneness between the knower and the Absolute Knowledge.
an absolutely virtuous man.
an absolutely virtuous woman.
that which helps realise the truth.
= ಕೇವಲಜ್ಞಾನ.
= ಕೇವಲಜ್ಞಾನಿ.
= ಕೇವಲಜ್ಞಾನ.
a specially intimate or dear friend; a bosom friend.
a specious argument for displaying ingenuity in reasoning or for deceiving someone; sophism.
= ಕೇವಲಜ್ಞಾನ.
= ಕೇವಲತ್ವ.
= ಕೇವಲಜ್ಞಾನಿ.

= ಕೇವಣಿಸು.
sexual intercourse; coition.
(dial.) a place designated for a meeting or assembling (esp. for transacting a secret business).
(dial.) a huge, abnormal profit or fortune.
an earthy clay, coloured by iron oxide, usu. yellow or reddish brown, used as a pigment in paints; ochre.
the color of ochre; esp., dark yellow.
a cloth of this colour, usu. used by Hindu ascetics and mendicants.
the hair growing on the head.
the mane of a horse or lion.
a ray of light.
Varuṇa, the Ocean-God.
a kind of perfume made from the fragrant grass Andropogon muricatus.
(Buddh.) the luxuriant growth of hair of a woman who is curled at the end and touches her hips, considered as a virtue.
a disease characterised by falling of hair resulting in the head becoming bald.
any of a genus (Capra) of wild or domesticated bovid ruminants with hollow horns; a goat (either gender).
Viṣṇu.

a wingless, bloodsucking hemipteran insect, Cimex lectularius, with a broad, flat, reddish-brown body and an unpleasant odour that infests beds, furniture, walls, etc., which is active mainly at night; a bedbug.
hair that is grown thick.
a head (or a person) having thick growth of hair.
a bunch of hairs tied; a tuft.
hair that is grown long and thick.
a binding of hair; hair tied into a bundle.
(dance.) one of the dance hand gestures in which one of the hands placed at the hip is turned down and the other turned up and both moved alternatively from shoulder to hip and hip to shoulder.
= ಕೇಶಬಂಧ- 1.
a crown like head ornament used in Yakṣagāna, the drama system prevalent in the coastal districts of Karnāṭaka.
an ornamenting, beautifying the hair.
a combing and braiding of hair.
a thin strip of hard rubber, plastic, metal, etc. with teeth, passed through the hair to arrange or clean it; a comb.
= ಕೇಶಮಾರ್ಜನ -2.
the dried, aromatic stigmas of the plant Crocus sativus of Iridaceae family, used in flavouring and colouring foods, and formerly in medicine; saffron powder.
the plant Wedelia calendulacea of Asteraceae family.
= ಕೇಶರಾಜ.
hair that is grown long and thick.
having much or handsome hair.
Viṣṇu or Křṣṇa.
a cutting or shaving of hairs.
helping hair grow strong, long and luxuriant.
that (as hair oil, shampoo, etc.) which is used as an aid, nutrient, in growing strong, long and luxuriant growth of hair.
= ಕೇಶವಿನ್ಯಾಸ.
the way in which hair is dressed or a special style of hairdressing.
a braid or plait of hair.
hair that is grown long and thick.
a fighting pulling each other's hair.
having long, much or handsome hair.
a solitary, wandering, accomplished sage, withdrawn from society, in Vedic period.
a man having much or handsome hair.
having, covered with hair; hairy.
the grass Chrysopogon aciculatus ( = Andropogon aciculatus) of Poaceae family.
hair that is grown long and thick.
red colour or any of its shades.
the hair growing on the head; .
red or reddish rice; unpolished rice.
the red flesh of animals used as food.
a foot that is red or pink in colour.
a man with red or pink foot.
the brightness or lustre of a maṇs red or pink foot.
(bot.) the stalk of a stamen bearing the anther; the filament of a flower.
the fine, dust like mass of grains that are produced in the anthers or microspore sacs of seed plants, containing the male sexual cells (gametophytes) of the plant; pollen.
the long hair growing from the top or sides of the neck of certain animals, as the horse or lion; the mane.
the tree Mimusops elengi of Sapotaceae family.
the tree Mesua ferrea of Guttiferae family; Iron wood of Ceylon.
the perennial plant Crocus sativus of Iridaceae family with funnel-shaped, purplish flowers having orange stigmas; saffron plant.
the tree Bixa orellana of Bixaceae family.
the tree Mammea suriga ( = Ochrocarpus longifolius) of Clusiaceae family.
its flowers.
gold.
(bot.) the stalk of a stamen bearing the anther; filament.
a stalk or column supporting the stamens, formed by the fusion of their filaments; an androphore.
= ಕೇಸರಿಭಾತು.
(bot.) the stamens and the parts belonging to them, collectively; all the microsporophylls of a flower; the androecium.
any red flower.
that which has mane; a lion, horse, etc.
orange yellow colour.
a red soil region.
the tree Mimusops elengi of Sapotaceae family.
its flower.
the perennial plant Crocus sativus of Iridaceae family with funnel-shaped, purplish flowers having orange stigmas; saffron plant.
the dried, aromatic stigmas of this plant, used in flavouring and colouring foods, and formerly in medicine; saffron.
the tree Mallotus philippensis ( = Rottlera tinctoria) of Euphorbiaceae family.
the semitropical tree Citrus medica of Rutaceae family; citron.
its yellow, thick-skinned fruit resembling a lime or lemon but larger and less acid; citron fruit.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system. derived from the main mode Māraranjani.
the tree Casuarina equisetifolia ( = C. muricata) of Casuarinaceae family, with jointed, green branchlets that bear scalelike leaves that grow in a circular manner; beefwood; casuarina tree.
a female lion; a lioness.
a fabulous mythological animal said to have eight legs and to be stronger than and enemy of lions.
a fabulous mythological bird with two heads said to be the most strong being among birds and other animals.
the royal seat of a king, usu. having the design of a lion on it; a throne.
the climbing annual plant Lathyrus sativus of Papilionaceae family.
its pea; sweet-pea.
a red variety of paddy.
rice cooked with sugar and dried aromatic stigmas of saffron plant (Crocus sativus of Iridaceae family).
another sweet dish made of soji, sugar and dried saffron stigmas.
a woman having a very slender waiste (resembling that of a lion).
to turn red; to cause to become red or reddish.
the flower of the plant Crocus sativus of Iridaceae family.
the flower of the shrub Bixa orellana of Bixaceae family.
any red flower.
a brown horse.
= ಕೇಶಾಕೇಶಿ.
the plant Dendrophthoe falcata of Loranthus longiflorus of Loranthaceae family.
a kind of thick, red ant.
to cause to have sexual intercourse.
the large, tropical plant Colocasia esculenta ( = C. antiquorum, = Arum colocasia) of Araceae family, with shield-shaped leaves, cultivated for its edible corns.
its tuber.
red colour or any of its shades.
the broken outer coat or husk, of grains of wheat, rye, oats, etc. separated from the flour after grinding, as by sifting; bran.
a silk cloth.
a suit between private parties at law or in equity; case before a civil court; a law suit.
a legal action or suit, esp. one studied or cited as a precedent.
a container, as a box, crate, chest, sheath or folder.
a protective cover.
a person being treated or helped, as by a doctor or social worker.
an example, instance or occurrence.
any individual or matter requiring or undergoing official or formal observation, study, investigation, etc.
a frame as for a window, door, artwork or photograph.
the red or reddish yellow flame of a burning mass.
= ಕೇಸುರಿಗಣ್ಣು.
an eye that has become red with fury.
a furious look.
to put forth red or reddish yellow flame.
the red bulb of the plant Allium cepa of Liliaceae family; onion.
= ಕೇಸೆರುಗು.
a red-coloured ant.
the body (of a human being) that is red, reddish, pinkish or yellow.
a man whose body complexion is red, reddish, pinkish or yellow.
the planet Mars, the seventh largest in the solar system.
a person who associates with or accompanies another or others; an associate; a companion.
any of a genus (Plantago) of plants of the plantain family, usu. with rosettes of basal leaves and spikes of tiny, greenish flowers; plantain.
its fruit.
a group assembled for amusement or recreation; a party; a gathering for merry-making.
(dial.) a feast or banquet hosted before the actual ceremony of a marriage, etc.
the fruit of the coconut palm; a coconut.
any activity or experience that gives enjoyment or recreation; a game; a sport.
an amorous sport or love-making activity.
any of a series of such horizontal lines in parallel, as of seats in a hall, etc.; a row.
a road in a town or city; a street.
the act or process of perceiving sounds; a hearing.

a formal questioning of a person presenting an evidence or arguing etc. in a court of law or before investigative body, legislative committee, etc. 3) the act of asking or expressing a desire, for something; solicitation or petition; a requesting.
a thing requested or begged for.
a prayer orison (as to God).
a playing of a big drum publicising commencement of the performance of Yakṣagāna or Kathakkaḷi dance.
a building for playing games; a sport-house.
a dance programme on a particular theme.
a theatre where dance programme is presented to the audience.
one of the two pieces of coconut-shell broken horizontally.
cheerful, playful conversation.
a man fond of being engaged always in sport or merriment.
a man lacking seriousness in his acts.
to cause to hear.
to be heard.
to hear.
to cause to beg, request.
ಕೇಳಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳು kēḷisikoḷḷu to hear; 2. to listen attentively.
to amuse oneself, as by taking part in a game or sport; engage in recreation; to play.
a game, entertainment, etc. that amuses; amusement.
= ಕೇಳಿಗೃಹ.
= ಕೇಳಿಗೃಹ.
an artificial mountain for playing on.
a man fond of or full of sport or merriment; a playful man.
a woman fond of or full of sport or merriment; a playful woman.
a pleasure-grove or garden.
= ಕೇಳೀಭೂಧರ.
a place for playing game or for amusement.
to perceive or sense (sounds), esp. through stimulation of auditory nerves in the ear by sound waves; to hear.
to listen attentively to and consider.
to be informed of; be told; to learn.
to agree to or accept (an advice).
to ask a question or questions of; to interrogate; to put queries to.
to demand explanation (from a person responsible).
to ask for as charity or as a gift.
to ask for earnestly as a kindness or favour.
to be heard.
ಕೇಳಿಕೊಳ್ಳು kēḷikoḷḷu to ask (to know about); 2. to beg humbly; to beseech earnestly; to entreat; to implore;ಕೇಳಿಬರು k ēḷibaru to be heard.
a man who listens; a listener.
= ಕೇಳ್ವೆ - 1; 2) an adhering to anothe's advice.
an advanced, concealed position near the enemy's lines, for detecting the enemy's movements by listening; a listening post.
that which is heard.
that which is said or conveyed through words.
the act or an instance of listening.
an unconfirmed report, story or statement in general circulation; a rumour.
the act, process or an instance of listening.
an asking; an inquiry.
something that is asked; a question.
a request; an earnest entreating or imploring.
to cause to separate chaff, unwanted lighter particles, etc. from grain by winnowing.
to separate chaff, unwanted lighter particles etc. from grain, by winnowing.
(fig.) to examine with care and separate deficiencies in a work.
any of a series of such horizontal lines in parallel, as of seats in a hall, etc.; a row.
to do, perform (an action etc.) to carry out; to fulfil.

to cultivate - a) to prepare and use (soil or land) for growing crops; to till; b) to break up the surface soil around (plants) in order to destroy weeds, prevent crusting, and preserve moisture; c) to grow (plants or crops) from seeds, bulbs, shoots, etc.
ಕೈಯಾನು kaiyānu = ಕೈಯ್ಯಾನು.
the part of the human body attached to the end of the forearm, including the wrist, palm, fingers, and thumb; the hand.
a long, flexible snout or proboscis, as of an elephant.
any of the slender pointer, usu. turning on a pivot, as in a compass, clock, speedometer or other gauge; a needle.
an instrument, usu. of metal, for moving the bolt of a lock and thus locking or unlocking something; a key.
any woody extension growing from the trunk or main stem or from a main limb, of a tree or shrub; a branch.
something intermediate through which something is done, passed, conveyed, etc.
that which can be easily or conveniently used.
the act or an instance of helping; a help; assistance; aid.
any of the thin lines or beams, of light that appear to come from a bright source; a ray.
a rough linear measure, approx. equal to the length from the tip of the middle finger of one hand to the tip of the middle finger of another when stretched apart.
quality or character which enables a person to face danger with boldness or fortitude; courage, bravery; valour.

ಕೈಕಟ್ಟಿ ಕೂರು kai kaṭṭi kūru to do nothing; to spend time without working, earning or extending help (to another); ಕೈಕಟ್ಟಿರು kai kaṭṭiru (one's ability or opportunity to act) to be not restricted or denied; ಕೈಕಟ್ಟಿ ಹಾಕು kai kaṭṭi hāku to make one unable to act as he or she would wish; to tie one's hands; ಕೈ ಕಡಿಯುತ್ತಿರು kai kaḍiyuttiru to have a restless desire to spend one's money ಕೈ ಕೆರೆಯುತ್ತಿರು kai kereyuttiru = ಕೈ ಕಡಿಯುತ್ತಿರು; ಕೈ ಕೆಸರಾಗು kai kesarāgu (fig.) to work hard; ಕೈ ಕೆಸರಾದರೆ ಬಾಯಿ ಮೊಸರು kai kesarādare bāyi mosaru (prov.) hard work gives sweet fruits; If you don't crack the shell,you can't eat the nut; no pains, no gains; ಕೈಕೆಳಗೆ kai keḷage (see under ಕೈಕೆಳಗು ); ಕೈ ಕೈ ಮಿಲಾಯಿಸು kai kai milāyisu (a physical fight) to take place or happen; 2. to exchange blows with; ಕೈ ಕೈ ಹಿಸುಕಿಕೊ kai kai hisukiko to regret; to feel sorry helplessly; ಕೈ ಕೊಡು kai koḍu to stretch one's hand to hold another's as a help or in welcoming with a greeting, etc.; 2. to help; to extend one's assistance to another; 3. (fig.) to cheat; to deceive; to breach trust; 4. (said of machinery, vehicle, etc.) to break or cease to function; ಕೈಗಣ್ಮು kaigaṇmu to go beyond one's reach, control or authority; 2. to happen; to occur; ಕೈ ಗಿಡ್ಡಮಾಡು kai giḍḍmāḍu (fig.) to decrease or cause to lose, another's strength, authority or power; 2. (fig.) to spend money sparingly and carefully; ಕೈಗೆ ಕೈ ಹತ್ತು kaige kai hattu = ಕೈ ಕೈ ಮಿಲಾಯಿಸು; ಕೈಗೆತ್ತಿಕೊ kaigettiko to start workin on; to commence; to take up; ಕೈಗೆ ಬರು kaige baru to come into one's hand; to be physically available with; to be available; 2. (one's child) to come of age; to become able to earn; ಕೈಗೆ ಬಂದದ್ದು ಬಾಯಿಗೆ ಬರಲಿಲ್ಲ kaige bandaddu bāyige baralilla many a slip between the cup and the lip; ಕೈಗೆ ಬಾಯಿಗೆ ನೇರ kaige bāyige nēra a condition in which having nothing to spare beyond basic necessities; a hand–to–mouth existence; ಕೈಗೆ ಮಾಡು kaige māḍu to take into one's hands; to take over (the possession); to conquer; 2. to hand over; to pass the possession to another; ಕೈಗೆ ಹತ್ತದಿರು kaige hattadiru (said of income) to be meagre or insufficient to spare beyond basic necessities; ಕೈ ಚಲ್ಲು kai callu = ಕೈ ಚೆಲ್ಲು; ಕೈ ಚೆಲ್ಲು kai cellu to stretch one's hand (as a gesture); 2. to abandon one's plan, course of action, etc.(usu. helplessly or in apathy); to throw in one's hand; ಕೈ ಚಾಚು kai cācu to stretch one's hand; 2. (fig.) to beg for; to implore for a favour; ಕೈ ಜಾರು kai jāru to slip down from one's hand; 2. (an opportunity, chance) to be missed; ಕೈಜೋಡಿಸು kai jōḍisu to join together with another to do something; to help, associate oneself with, another; 2. to be in intimate association or close agreement or cooperation (in carrying out something); to have a hand in glove; ಕೈ ತುಂಬ kai tumba (giving, donating, helping, etc.) plentifully; as much as possible; sufficiently; ಕೈ ತುಂಬ ಕೆಲಸ kai tumba kelasa a good deal of work; ಕೈ ತುಂಬ ಕೆಲಸವಿರು kai tumba kelasaviru to be very busy; to have lot of work to do; ಕೈ ತುಂಬ ಬರು kai tumba baru (salary, income etc.) to be available (regularly) handsomely; ಕೈ ತುಂಬ ಸಂಪಾದಿಸು kai tumba sampādisu to earn a handsome salary; to get large income (usu. regularly); ಕೈ ತೊಳೆದುಕೊ kai toḷeduko to refuse to go on with or take responsibility for; to wash one's hands of; ಕೈ ತೋರಿಸಿ ಅವಲಕ್ಷಣ ಅನ್ನಿಸಿಕೊ kai tōrisi avalakṣaṇa annisiko (prov.) to invite bad comments or troubles unnecessarily; to scheme for one's own disgrace; ಕೈ ದೊಡ್ಡದು ಮಾಡು kai doḍḍadu māḍu to give, spend, donate, etc. liberally; ಕೈ ನಾಲ್ಕಾಗು kai nālkāgu to be married; to marry; ಕೈ ಬದಲಾಯಿಸು kai badalāyisu to pass into different ownership; to change hands; ಕೈ ಬರಿದಾಗು kai baridāgu to become penniless; ಕೈ ಬರು kai baru (used negatively) (one's hand, tendency) to be ready to give; ಕೈ ಬಿಚ್ಚು kai biccu (fig.) to spend money liberally; ಕೈ ಬೆಚ್ಚಗೆ ಮಾಡು kai beccage māḍu to offer or give a bribe to; to oil one's palms; ಕೈ ಮೇಲಾಗು kai mēlāgu (one's strength, power, influence, in a combat, competition, etc.) to excel (another's); ಕೈಮೇಲೆ ಕೊಡು kai mēle koḍu to give money in cash immediately; 2. to give money in addition to the right cost or as a bribe; ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಾಗದವನು ಮೈ ಪರಚಿಕೊಂಡ kaiyallāgadavanu mai paracikoṇḍa inefficient person gets irritated at his failure; ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಾಗು kaiyalllāgu to be possible (to be done, accomplished, fulfilled, etc.); ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಾದುದನ್ನೆಲ್ಲಾ ಮಾಡು kaiyallādudannellā māḍu to try as hard as possible; to strain every nerve; ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿ ಇಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡಿರು kaiyalliṭṭukoṇḍiru (fig.) (by greasing the palms) to have a person in power who would favour (one); to have person at one's beck; ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಇಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡು ತುಪ್ಪಕ್ಕೆ ಅಳು kaiyalli beṇṇe iṭṭukoṇḍu tuppakke aḷu (prov.) why grumble for a thing which you can easily make with available the resources and means; ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿರು kaiyalliru (fig.)to be readily available for use when needed; to be at hand; 2. (fig.) (persons in power) to be under the influence of; 3. to be within one's power, capacity (to do); ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹರಿ kaiyalli hari (usu. used interrogatively or negatively) to be possible (for a person); ಕೈಯಿಕ್ಕು kaiyikku = ಕೈಯಿಡು; ಕೈಯಿಗೂ ಬಾಯಿಗೂ ಜಗಳ kaiyigū bāyigū jagaḷa (a playful term) engagement of both hand and mouth (i.e. being engaged in eating); ಕೈಯಿಡು kaiyiḍu to attempt; to try to do; to lay one's hands on; ಕೈಯಿರು kaiyiru (one's role, influence, etc.) to be in making a thing happen (esp. a bad one); ಕೈಯೆತ್ತಿ ಕೊಡು kaiyetti koḍu to give, donate liberally or wholeheartedly; ಕೈಯೆತ್ತು kaiyettu to give a blow; to assault; 2. (fig.) to express one's agreement with, support to another; to support another's opinion in a meeting: 3. to give up in despair; to show one's inability in helping another; to throw up one's hands; ಕೈಯೊಳಗೆ ಇರು kaiyoḷage iru to be in one's hand; to be in (one's) possession; 2. to be under one's authority or influence; ಕೈಯ್ಯಾನು kaiyyānu (rightly,ಕೈಯಾನು) to stretch one's hand in supplication; to beg (as for alms); ಕೈ ಸಡಿಲು ಬಿಡು kai saḍilu biḍu to be liberal (in giving, donating, spending money, etc.); ಕೈ ಸುಟ್ಟುಕೊ kai suṭṭuko (fig.) to suffer a loss in a venture or undertaking; to burn one's fingures; ಕೈ ಹಾಕು kai hāku to undertake; to endeavour; to try; 2. to interefere; to meddle (in another's work); ಕೈ ಹಿಡಿ kai hiḍi to take (a person of other sex) in marriage; to marry; 2. to give a helping hand; to help; ಕೈ ಹಿಡಿದು ನಡೆಸು kai hiḍidu naḍesu to care, help or assist in shaping another's life; to lead by the hand; ಅವರ ಕೈ, ಅವರ ಬಾಯಿ avara kai, avara bayi (coll.) absolute freedom in working or managing; ಎತ್ತಿದ ಕೈ ettida kai an able, skilled, talented person; ಎರಡು ಕೈ ಸೇರಿದರೆ ಚಪ್ಪಾಳೆ eraḍu kai sēridare cappāḷe (prov.) you cannot clap with a single hand; it takes two to make a quarrel; ಒಂದು ಕೈ ತೋರಿಸು ondu kai tōrisu to use one's physical strength (as in fighting, combat, etc.); ಒಂದು ಕೈ ನೋಡಿಕೊ ondu kai nōḍiko (said to one's oppponent that one is ready) to show one's strength; to use force; ಒಂದು ಕೈ ನೋಡು ondu kai nōḍu to try (one's luck at something); to take a chance; 2. (coll.) to show one's strength (in fighting); ಕಾಣದ ಕೈ kāṇada kai (fig.) a person causing or helping from behind something to happen (without being seen by others); ಬರಿಯ ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮೊಳ ಹಾಕಬೇಡ bariya kaiyalli moḷa hākabēḍa (prov.) unless you are practical, do not endeavour; count not four, except you have them in a wallet; ಬಲಗೈ ಕಡಿಯುತ್ತಿರು balagai kaḍiyuttiru to feel that some money is coming to one's pocket.
the act of beautifying or enhancing the beauty by adorning with ornaments, etc.
ಕೈ ಹಿಡಿದೆತ್ತು kai hiḍidettu (fig.) to pull out a person from a difficult condition; to help; ಕೈ ಹೆಂಚು kai hencu a traditional 'U'-type roof tile.
a piece of cleared land, set off or enclosed, for raising crops; an agricultural land.
any agricultural crop grown; cultivated plants, as a whole.
the plant Apodytes benthamiana of Icacinaceae family; leathery false holly.
the duty of a servant; service; servitude.

a wicked or despicable woman.
short stabbing-weapon with a pointed and edged blade; a dagger.

ಕೈಕಾಲಾಗಿ ಬರು kai kālāgi baru to follow or obey humbly or subserviently ( for getting a favour); ಕೈಕಾಲಿಗೆ ಆಗು kai kālige āgu (fig.) (waste matter from the body, as faeces, urine, etc.) to be eliminated; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಆಡದಿರು kaikālu āḍadiru to become fearful or apprehensive, hence stupefied; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಆಡಿಸು kaikālu āḍisu to move the hands and legs (freely); 2. (fig.) to go for a walk (after being unmoved for sometime); 3. (fig.) to be free from binding difficulties, financial crunch, etc.; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳ್ಳು kaikālu kaṭṭikoḷḷu (fig.) to hold another's feet humbly, in supplication or with an imploring request; to submit oneself to another helplessly; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಕಟ್ಟಿಹಾಕು kaikālu kaṭṭi hāku (fig.) to deny another any chance of moving, scheming, planning, and render helpless; ಕೈಕಾಲುಗೆಡಿಸು kaikālugeḍisu to cause another become apprehensive, tremulous or diffident; ಕೈಕಾಲುಗೆಡು kaikālugeḍu to lose strength, enthusiasm; to become diffident or despondent; ಕೈಕಾಲು ತಣ್ಣಗಾಗು kai kālu taṇnagāgu (fig.) to die; 2. (fig.) to get horrified or terrified totally; ಕೈಕಾಲು ತೊಳೆ kaikālu toḷe (fig.) to go for discharging faeces and urine; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬಡಿ kai kālu baḍi to struggle hard to come up; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬರು kaikālu baru (fig.) (one's strength, confidence etc.) to come back; to be regained; (relief from anxiety) to be had; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬಿಡಿಸು kaikālu biḍisu = ಕೈಕಾಲುಗೆಡಿಸು; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬಿಡು kaikālu biḍu = ಕೈಕಾಲುಗೆಡು; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬೀಳು kaikālu bīḷu (one's strength, self-confidence) to be lost, hence to be come stupefied; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಮೆಟ್ಟು kaikālu meṭṭu the condition of being a slave; bondage; servitude; slavery; ಕೈಕಾಲು ಹಿಡಿ kaikālu hiḍi to implore humbly (usu. at the cost of one's prestige, pride, etc.) ಕೈಕಾಲು ಹೋಗು kaikālu hōgu = ಕೈಕಾಲು ಬೀಳು; ಕೈಕಾಲ್ಬಡೆ kaikālbaḍe (fig.) to regain one's strength, confidence, etc.; to get relief from anxiety.

the change in social and economic organisation resulting from the replacement of hand tools by machine and power tools and the development of large-scale industrial production; an industrial revolution.

ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಆಟಗಾರ kaigāvalu āṭagāra a member of a playing team, who is kept in reserve to replace a player, if required; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಚಕ್ರ kaigāvalu cakra a spare wheel for a motor vehicle, consisting of a ready-inflated tyre on a spokeless metal rim, which could be clamped temporarily over a punctured wheel; a stepney; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ದಾಸ್ತಾನು kaigāvalu dāstānu a stock (of things, as grain, amunition,etc.) kept for special purpose or for use in time of scarcity or distress; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಮೊಬಲಗು kaigāvalu mobalagu an amount of money kept for later use or for a special purpose; a reserve fund; 2. an amount (in cash) given or lent for contingent expenses in an organisation or office; imprest; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ವಸ್ತು kaigāvalu vastu something kept back or stored up, as for later use or for a special purpose; a reserve; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಸೈನ್ಯ kaigāvalu sainya = ಕೈಗಾವಲು - 3; ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಹಣ kaigāvalu haṇa = ಕೈಗಾವಲು ಮೊಬಲಗು.
